TypeScript 5.3 beta just went out! Now slimmer and faster, with lots of new narrowing improvements, correctness checks, import attributes, and more - so try it out now!https://t.co/HH0wN9jug6

— TypeScript (@typescript) October 3, 2023

We just released TypeScript 5.2 Beta! Check out

- 'using' Declarations
- Decorator Metadata
- Easier Tuple Type Notation
- The "Inline Variable" Refactoring
- Comma Completions in Object Literals

and more! Try it today!https://t.co/KXlaBsYxz1

— TypeScript (@typescript) June 30, 2023

TypeScript 5.1 Beta is now available to try, with

- smarter checks for undefined-returning functions
- no restrictions between getter/setter types
- customizable tag checks for JSX libraries
- linked editing for JSX
- @‚Å†param snippets

and more!https://t.co/UjXm9TO5GO

— TypeScript (@typescript) April 18, 2023

Announcing our private beta!

We're excited to launch our private beta today at TC Startup Battlefield 200.@joindimension enables modern teams to build and deploy products in record time.
